title: Claim Card

claim_id.description: Optional stable identifier for this claim card.

claim_text.description: EXACT claim text (verbatim) as stated in the source; do not paraphrase, summarize, or omit words.

speaker.description: Who made the claim (person/org/author), as shown in the source.

date.description: When the claim was made/published, in ISO 8601 date or date-time.

source_url.description: Canonical link to the source containing the claim.

source_title.description: Optional human-readable title of the source.

type.description: Anchor type locating the claim inside the source.

value.description: Anchor value (e.g., exact quote snippet, page number, timestamp, section heading, line range).

source_url.description: Optional duplicate/alternate source link for provenance (if different from context.source_url).

retrieved_at.description: Optional ISO 8601 date-time when the source was accessed.

notes.description: Optional analyst notes; must not replace required verbatim/context/provenance fields.

$comment: Intake checklist: require verbatim claim_text + context(speaker/date/source_url) + provenance.anchor(type/value). If any required field is missing/empty, validation fails and downstream systems MUST abstain from using the claim.

abstain_when: claim_text is missing, empty, or not verbatim (paraphrase/summarization)
